title: PBS.Frontline.2015.Terror.in.Little.Saigon.720p.HDTV.x264.MVG
description:
Terror in Little Saigon

Sociopolitical Documentary hosted by Adam Clay Thompson, published by PBS broadcasted as part of PBS Frontline series in 2015 - English narration
 
http://docuwiki.net/images/5/58/Terror-in-Little-Saigon-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

FRONTLINE and ProPublica investigate the unsolved murders of a series of Vietnamese-American journalists, uncovering a trail that leads from American cities to jungles in Southeast Asia.
